title: "AI Is Helping A Visually Impaired Gold Medallist To Study During Lockdown"
excerpt: "Abbie Robinson, a visually impaired rock climber, who currently holds the World Championship title for paraclimbing is relying on a device that uses machine learning and computer vision to help her with everyday activities during the pandemic."
